document_data.name: Couter
document_data.mainbody: A '''couter''' was a common component of [[plate armor]], being the hinged piece that covered a wearer's elbow.
document_data.Notable Couters:
* The ''[[arm of valor]]'', an enchanted [[adamantite]] platemail arm covering, was separated into five pieces that each held their own power. One of these pieces was a couter with a wing-like design.
* ''[[couters of second changes]]'', enchanted couters that could turn a missed strike into a dead-on blow.<ref>
